A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Created an account just to rate this movie....... How does someone who makes a great scifi movie like Looper\, and have a company like Disney who can throw hundreds of millions at you\, mess up Starwars. I just don't understand. Everything from the writing\, to casting\, to plot points\, to pointless side missions\, to basic lack of intelligence from the bad and the good. My God Rian Johnson dropped the ball on this one. Would give it 1 star\, but it was a beautiful looking movie. Props to the special effects team.
